## General

Existing guidelines are available at [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/fastrepl/hyprnote/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md).

## Pro License Key for Development

Some non-essential features in Hyprnote require a [Pro License Key](/pro/what-is-this) to be used.

You can use the following key for development:

```bash
.DA5FHa93C5foni0BemV3O7HfJgQlKml_qr0lnJKgW5MbzIDXItPZR6fm8czl9HFlo6_2p0EVZ2NXGuUZjSpPDQ==
```

Note that this key is

- Only valid for development environment
- Can be used unlimited times, for unlimited machines

## Plugin

```bash
npx @tauri-apps/cli plugin new something \
--no-example \
--directory ./plugins/something
```
